description:
Akechi Mitsuhide, who was responsible for Oda Nobunaga’s death, appears to have been reincarnated as a handsome young man named Hideto. Cinnamon’s owner, Ichiko, develops feelings for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyuunyuu Man to Ichigo Panty... Honnouji no Ren?
Milkman and Strawberry Panties... Love at Honnouji!?
بائع الحليب وملابس الفراولة الداخلية... الحب في هونوجي؟!
牛乳マンとイチゴパンティ... 本能寺の恋[れん]?
